org.hps.readout.svt

Class SVTTrackerHitReadoutDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.readout.SLICDataReadoutDriver<SimTrackerHit>
          • org.hps.readout.SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver
            • org.hps.readout.svt.SVTTrackerHitReadoutDriver

  • public class SVTTrackerHitReadoutDriver
extends SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver
    Class SVTTrackerHitReadoutDriver is an extension of SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver that includes additional functionality necessary for SVT data.
    See Also:
    SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver

      • getOnTriggerData

        protected Collection<TriggeredLCIOData<?>> getOnTriggerData(double triggerTime)
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Generates a Collection containing any special output data produced by the driver that should be included in triggered output.

        By default, this outputs null. Individual drivers must override the method as needed.
        Overrides:
        getOnTriggerData in class SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver
        Parameters:
        triggerTime - - The time at which the trigger occurred.
        Returns:
        Returns a collection containing all special output data.

        private Map<Integer,FpgaData> makeFPGAData(Subdetector subdetector)
